languages.text: {n}Несмотря на горделивую стойку, Маражай явно едва держится на ногах. Его доспех помят и местами расколот, а перекошенное лицо украшено кровавыми разводами.{/n} "Ближе, мон-кай... ближе, если не терпится познать ласку моих клинков..."

{n}Despite his proud stance, Marazhai is clearly struggling to stay upright. His armour is battered and chipped in places, and his twisted face is marred with bloody streaks.{/n} "Closer, mon-keigh... closer, if you are so eager to know the caress of my blades..."
languages.original_text: {n}Несмотря на горделивую стойку, Маражай явно едва держится на ногах. Его доспех помят и местами расколот, а перекошенное лицо украшено кровавыми разводами.{/n} "Ближе, мон-кай... ближе, если не терпится познать ласку моих клинков..."

traits.speaker: MarazhaiCompanion

traits.locale_text: {n}Despite his proud stance, Marazhai is clearly struggling to stay upright. His armour is battered and chipped in places, and his twisted face is marred with bloody streaks.{/n} "Closer, mon-keigh... closer, if you are so eager to know the caress of my blades..."
traits.speaker: MarazhaiCompanion

languages.text: {n}尽管玛拉斋摆出一副目中无人的姿态，但你看得出来，他光是站着就已用尽全力。他穿着破烂不堪的铠甲，血迹斑斑的脸上流露出扭曲的怒意。{/n}“再靠近点，猴子……再靠近点，让我的利刃好好爱抚爱抚你……”
languages.original_text: {n}Despite his proud stance, Marazhai is clearly struggling to stay upright. His armour is battered and chipped in places, and his twisted face is marred with bloody streaks.{/n} "Closer, mon-keigh... closer, if you are so eager to know the caress of my blades..."

traits.locale_text: {n}尽管玛拉斋摆出一副目中无人的姿态，但你看得出来，他光是站着就已用尽全力。他穿着破烂不堪的铠甲，血迹斑斑的脸上流露出扭曲的怒意。{/n}“再靠近点，猴子……再靠近点，让我的利刃好好爱抚爱抚你……”
traits.speaker: MarazhaiCompanion

languages.text: {n}Pese a su postura orgullosa, salta a la vista que Marazhai tiene problemas para mantenerse en pie. Varias piezas de su armadura están abolladas y rotas, y unos hilillos de sangre surcan su rostro contraído.{/n} «Acercaos más, mon-keigh... acercaos, si tan deseosos estáis de sentir la caricia de mis filos...».
languages.original_text: {n}Despite his proud stance, Marazhai is clearly struggling to stay upright. His armour is battered and chipped in places, and his twisted face is marred with bloody streaks.{/n} "Closer, mon-keigh... closer, if you are so eager to know the caress of my blades..."

traits.locale_text: {n}Pese a su postura orgullosa, salta a la vista que Marazhai tiene problemas para mantenerse en pie. Varias piezas de su armadura están abolladas y rotas, y unos hilillos de sangre surcan su rostro contraído.{/n} «Acercaos más, mon-keigh... acercaos, si tan deseosos estáis de sentir la caricia de mis filos...».
traits.speaker: MarazhaiCompanion

languages.text: {n}Marazhai affiche une posture fière, mais vous voyez qu'il ne s'agit que d'une façade. Son armure est cabossée et abîmée, et son visage grimaçant est couvert de sang.{/n} « Approchez, mon-keigh... Venez goûter à la caresse de mes lames... »
languages.original_text: {n}Despite his proud stance, Marazhai is clearly struggling to stay upright. His armour is battered and chipped in places, and his twisted face is marred with bloody streaks.{/n} "Closer, mon-keigh... closer, if you are so eager to know the caress of my blades..."

traits.locale_text: {n}Marazhai affiche une posture fière, mais vous voyez qu'il ne s'agit que d'une façade. Son armure est cabossée et abîmée, et son visage grimaçant est couvert de sang.{/n} « Approchez, mon-keigh... Venez goûter à la caresse de mes lames... »
traits.speaker: MarazhaiCompanion

languages.text: {n}Trotz seines stolzen Auftretens hat Marazhai sichtlich Mühe, weiter aufrecht zu stehen. Seine Rüstung ist an mehreren Stellen verformt und beschädigt, und sein verzerrtes Gesicht ist gezeichnet von Blutschlieren.{/n} "Kommt näher, Chem-Pan-Sey ... noch näher, wenn Ihr unbedingt Freundschaft mit meinen Klingen schließen wollt ..."
languages.original_text: {n}Despite his proud stance, Marazhai is clearly struggling to stay upright. His armour is battered and chipped in places, and his twisted face is marred with bloody streaks.{/n} "Closer, mon-keigh... closer, if you are so eager to know the caress of my blades..."

traits.locale_text: {n}Trotz seines stolzen Auftretens hat Marazhai sichtlich Mühe, weiter aufrecht zu stehen. Seine Rüstung ist an mehreren Stellen verformt und beschädigt, und sein verzerrtes Gesicht ist gezeichnet von Blutschlieren.{/n} "Kommt näher, Chem-Pan-Sey ... noch näher, wenn Ihr unbedingt Freundschaft mit meinen Klingen schließen wollt ..."
traits.speaker: MarazhaiCompanion

languages.text: {n}誇らしげな姿勢とは裏腹に、マラズハイは立っているのがやっとのようだった。アーマーはところどころ欠けており、歪んだ顔には血の跡が残っている。{/n}「来いよ、モン＝ケイ…かかってこい。俺の刃の味を知りたけりゃな…」
languages.original_text: {n}Despite his proud stance, Marazhai is clearly struggling to stay upright. His armour is battered and chipped in places, and his twisted face is marred with bloody streaks.{/n} "Closer, mon-keigh... closer, if you are so eager to know the caress of my blades..."

traits.locale_text: {n}誇らしげな姿勢とは裏腹に、マラズハイは立っているのがやっとのようだった。アーマーはところどころ欠けており、歪んだ顔には血の跡が残っている。{/n}「来いよ、モン＝ケイ…かかってこい。俺の刃の味を知りたけりゃな…」
traits.speaker: MarazhaiCompanion

languages.text: {n}Marazhai'ın gururlu vaziyetine rağmen dik durmakta zorlandığı çok açık. Zırhı, yer yer ezilip ufalanmışken eğri büğrü suratı ise kandan çizgilerle lekelenmiş.{/n} "Yaklaş mon-keigh... Bıçaklarımın dokunuşunu böylesine merak ediyorsan daha da yaklaş."
languages.original_text: {n}Despite his proud stance, Marazhai is clearly struggling to stay upright. His armour is battered and chipped in places, and his twisted face is marred with bloody streaks.{/n} "Closer, mon-keigh... closer, if you are so eager to know the caress of my blades..."

traits.locale_text: {n}Marazhai'ın gururlu vaziyetine rağmen dik durmakta zorlandığı çok açık. Zırhı, yer yer ezilip ufalanmış ve eğri büğrü suratı, kandan çizgilerle lekelenmiş.{/n} "Yaklaş mon-keigh... Bıçaklarımın dokunuşunu böylesine merak ediyorsan daha da yaklaş."
traits.speaker: MarazhaiCompanion
